action.name: Shadow Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Nightmarish Visions
entries: Whenever a Nightmare Walker strikes with a shadow claw, they reduce the targets WIS score by 1. When a target hit by a Nightmare Walker drops to 0 Wisdom, they die and become a Nightmare Walker.
Doomed inhabitants of the plane of Dreams. These creatures walk the night looking to drain the sanity of any sentient creature they cross.

action.name: Staff Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 1d8 + 13}) damage.

action.name: Mind Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 1d8 + 13}) damage, plus 8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) Psycic damage.
Target must make an INT saving throw {@dc 15} or lose 1 INT for the next hour. A creature brought to 0 INT becomes Dreart Kemars thrall.

reaction.name: Dominate Mind
entries: Any creature who holds Dreart Kemar for more then 6 seconds will need to make a WIS saving throw against Dreart Kemars INT roll. On a failure Dreart completely dominates this persons body and he uses it as his own gaining all abilities they had and adopting their physical stats.
A body he has dominated but lost physical contact with will fall into a stupor for 24 hours and then become free if they do not make contact with him again.

legendary.name: Whirling Strike
entries: Dreart Kemar expertly spins his staff striking out at any creature he wishes to that is within 10 ft of him.
All creatures he targets must make a DEX saving throw {@dc 18} or be struck by Mind Strike

legendary.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5–6).
entries: Dreart Kemar magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary.name: Mental Download
entries: Whenever Dreart Kemar drains INT from a creature he may use a legendary action to copy one memory, ability, or spell they poses.

trait.name: Bladesong
entries: You can use a bonus action to start the Bladesong, which lasts for 1 minute. It ends early if you are {@condition incapacitated}, if you don medium or heavy armor or a shield, or if you use two hands to make an attack with a weapon. You can also dismiss the Bladesong at any time you choose (no action required).
While your Bladesong is active, you gain the following benefits:
• You gain a bonus to your AC equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1).
• Your walking speed increases by 10 feet.
• You have advantage on Dexterity (Acrobatics) checks.
• You gain a bonus to any Constitution saving throw you make to maintain your concentration on a spell. The bonus equals your Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1).
You can use this feature twice. You regain all expended uses of it when you finish a short or long rest.

trait.name: Alter Self
entries: The merry the clown can use its action to alter self into any number of physical forms. Merry can read the thoughts and emotions of anyone around him and can take on forms to exploit their deepest fears.

reaction.name: Fear Eater
entries: Merry can use his reaction to heal for one {@dice d12} every time he causes the fear status ailment to another creature.

legendary.name: Beep beep (2 actions)
entries: Merry honks his nose causing the balloons that surround him to pop violently. He teleports to another area in the process. (Thunderstep)
He can take non willing creatures with this ability

legendary.name: Clown shoe
entries: Merry does a happy little dance shaking the ground beneath him. All creatures within 50 ft. must make a dex save {@dc 15} or become knocked {@condition prone}

legendary.name: Fear Factor
entries: Merry crawls into the targets mind whispering terrifying truths or lies. Target must pass a Wisdown Saving throw {@dc 14}. On a failure they have disadvantage on their next saving throw.

legendary.name: Clowning Around
entries: Merry creates a horrifying illusion inside target creatures mind. They must pass an INT Saving throw {@dc 14} or they have disadvantage on all rolls.
Effected creatures can repeat the save at the start of each turn.
Only one creature can be effected at a time.

trait.name: Vectors
entries: Lucy use her Charisma modifier in place of your Strength modifier when making Strength checks and Strength saving throws.

The arms are weapons and have a reach of 15 feet. The arms deal slashing damage . When you attack with the arms, you can use your Charisma modifier instead of your Strength or Dexterity modifier for the attack and damage rolls.

action.name: Quadruple Attack
entries: Lucy can make a Vector Attack, and/or Vector Action 4 times a turn.

action.name: Vector Attack
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d6 + 8}) slashing damage.
Ignores resistance to slashing damage. Counts as magical damage.

action.name: Reflect Projectiles
entries: Lucy takes every missile attack she caught with her Vector Deflection and uses her vectors to accelerate them back at her enemies. Lucy can target any or all creatures she can see within 120 ft. and rolls attack rolls for each missile. Each missile does {@dice 1d4 + 4} (dex) damage

action.name: Vector Throw
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 20/120 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d4 + 8}) peircing damage.

action.name: Vector Action
entries: Lucy can Grapple, Shove, Throw, and take any other action a normal pair of arms can take with her vectors.

reaction.name: Vector Deflection
entries: As a reaction to being targeted by a ranged missile attack Lucy can raise her AC vs all ranged missile attacks this turn by +10 (A natural 20 will still hit)
Lucy suspends all missiles she is attacked by with her vectors until the end of her next turn
This ability disabled her vector attacks on her next turn but allows her to use her vector throw with every missile she has suspended.

reaction.name: Legendary Resistance
entries: Lucy has 3 legendary resistances.
